name.baseName: Cleaning cosmetics ; Surfactants, flavors, pigments, oils and waxes, gums, solvents, preservatives, etc. ; Compounding process ; All sizes; NESPS2
清洁类化妆品 ; 表面活性剂、香精、色素、油脂与蜡类、胶质类、溶剂类、防腐剂等① ; 复配工艺 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical + chemical + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical + chemical + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该工业流程涉及清洁类化妆品的复配，包括表面活性剂、香精、色素、油脂与蜡类、胶质类、溶剂类和防腐剂的应用与组合。这些复合物专门用于化妆品工业，并适用于所有规模的生产复配过程。此外，数据集的技术方面还涉及用于化妆品制造污染控制的末端治理技术。这项技术适用于通过物理、化学和好氧生物处理管理包括废水、化学需氧量、氨氮、石油相关废物、有机结合氮和总磷在内的多种污染物。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码26,四级代码2682文件，在完整版文件中第3009页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysical + chemical + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management87，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)

污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物理+化学+好氧生物处理法，其效率为87，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施年耗电量（千瓦时/年）/（污水处理设施的所有耗电设备额定功率（千瓦）×污水处理设施年运行时间（小时/年）），①由于各种化妆品生产中使用的原料品种繁多，系数表单中列举了几种常用原料，实际生产时并不局限于此。。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷
源文件中描述为为清洁类化妆品，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量
